articles.title: Which? crowns Aldi's Norpak Butter better than Lurpak in latest taste test
articles.author: Stephanie Bateman
articles.summary: Aldi's Nordpak Spreadable Slightly Salted Butter has been named the best spreadable butter by Which? at a cost of £2.18 per 500g tub. The Which? judges praised the spread for its'silky smooth texture' and'subtly salty taste'.

articles.title: Which? crowns Aldi's Norpak Butter better than Lurpak in latest taste test
articles.author: Senior Journalist
articles.summary: Aldi's Nordpak Spreadable Slightly Salted Butter has been crowned the best spreadable butter by Which? at a cost of £2.18 for 500g. The Which? judges praised Aldi's spread for its'silky smooth texture' and'subtly salty taste'

articles.title: Bargain supermarket butter crowned better than Lurpak in taste test
articles.author: Consumer Reporter
articles.summary: Aldi's Nordpak spreadable butter from discount supermarket is tastier than Lurpak and cheaper. Which? carried out a blind taste test to find out what shoppers preferred out of spreadables from the eight major supermarkets versus premium brand Lurpak. Lurpak is the most expensive spread tested, costing nearly £5 for 400g. Ocado, Lidl, Asda, Tesco, Waitrose and Morrisons spreadable butters also did well.

articles.title: Bargain supermarket butter crowned better than Lurpak in taste test
articles.author: Emily Mee
articles.summary: Aldi's Nordpak spreadable butter from discount supermarket is tastier than Lurpak and cheaper. Which? carried out a blind taste test to find out what shoppers preferred out of spreadables from the eight major supermarkets versus premium brand Lurpak. Ocado, Lidl and Asda butters also scored well, but Tesco and Waitrose didn't.

articles.title: Genspark's Super Agent ups the ante in the general AI agent race
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Palo Alto-based startup Genspark has launched a new AI agent called Super Agent. It's a fast-moving autonomous system designed to handle real-world tasks across a wide range of domains. It is built on a concert of nine different LLMs, more than 80 tools and over 10 proprietary datasets.

articles.title: I loved the Nintendo Switch, but the Switch 2 looks like every other console now: A worse PC with a few exclusive games
articles.summary: Nintendo's new console, the Switch 2, doesn't live up to the original Switch's success. The original Switch made me excited about Nintendo again, but the new one doesn't excite him. Nintendo's first party games aside, the promise of on-the-go triple-A gaming sounds just as compromised as on PC handhelds.

articles.title: Weekend brunch recipe: Cheesy egg salad bao buns recipe
articles.author: Fresh Recipes
articles.summary: Cheesy egg salad bao buns are served with soft and fluffy egg sandwiches. They are made with homemade mayonnaise instead of store-bought mayonnaising, which can be difficult to make yourself, so it's worth spending a few minutes making it yourself.

articles.title: We tried Amazon's bestselling spring dresses, but only a few impressed us
articles.summary: There's nothing quite like slipping into a cute dress on the first warm, sunny day. Amazon's bestsellers list does change often, but we tried 11 of the most popular styles that often pop up there. If you have Amazon Prime, you'll get free shipping.

articles.title: Microsoft's AI division head wants to create a lasting relationship between chatbots and their users
articles.summary: Mustafa Suleyman is the CEO of Microsoft's AI division. He wants to develop a new product line of personalised AI companions. Microsoft celebrated its 50th anniversary on Friday. It was attended by Bill Gates, Satya Nadella, Steve Ballmer and the current chief executive, who led the company from 2000 to 2014.

articles.title: 'I tried butter from every supermarket and this one was better than Lurpak'
articles.author: Astha Saxena
articles.summary: Experts have compared various butter sold in the supermarkets. Lurpak is the most popular choice among all the spreadable butter. Aldi's Nordpak Spreadable Slightly Salted secured the top spot for being a perfect match of taste and price. The panel of 67 people was asked to blind taste and rate eight supermarket options.

articles.title: The return of the Australian motor show is greatly exaggerated
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: The event is great to see a number of brands get together to show off their current and future products to the buying public and inspire the next generation of fanatics who will one day take my job. It is not an attack on the event, it is an opportunity for brands to showcase their products.

articles.title: Lifestyle Expert Chassie Post Tackles Spring Cleaning with an Innovative Product Showcase on Nationwide Media Tour
articles.author: NEWSFILE
articles.summary: News Media Group and InTheNews.TV launched a nationwide media tour to introduce two game-changing products designed to simplify the seasonal home refresh. The tour provided an opportunity for brands to align with practical, consumer-focused solutions during a key period for home improvement. Brands featured in the media tour included: Zep's Home Pro line and Dreame R10 Pure Cordless Stick Vacuum.

articles.title: This new Amazon Kindle feature harnesses AI in an actually useful way
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Amazon is rolling out a new "Recaps" feature for Kindle e-reader in the US. It uses artificial intelligence (GenAI) and Amazon moderators to provide storyline and character refreshers on a per-book basis. The iOS and iPadOS mobile Kindle app will be updated to incorporate the feature "soon," but there's no word on if the Android version of the app will also be updated.

articles.title: How Small Business Owners Can Boost Revenue Without Finding New Customers
articles.author: Daron Pressley
articles.summary: According to industry data, cross-selling can increase revenue by as much as 30% and improve customer retention for small businesses with tight margins. The best cross-sell opportunities fall into one of the following categories: Complementary products, complementary services and service add-ons.

articles.title: Amazon's new 'Buy for me' feature is a wild AI innovation
articles.author: Ryan Christoffel
articles.summary: The new "Buy for me" feature is currently being tested by Amazon. It uses AI to make purchases on your behalf from other retailers' sites.      .   in February, Amazon announced an interesting new test that would show you products from other sites.

articles.title: Amazon's new shopping agent is a glimpse of the future of AI
articles.summary: Buy for Me AI agent lets you buy products from other websites from within Amazon. It's only available in beta to a select few customers in the US. It will work on iPhone and Android, with Amazon Nova and Antrhopic Claude AI supporting the AI agent capabilities.

articles.title: RBC Caribbean Unveils New Brand Campaign: ‘Your Ideas Happen Here'
articles.author: Eyewitness News
articles.summary: RBC Caribbean announced today its new brand campaign, 'Your Ideas Happen Here.' The new strategy builds on the 'A Bank for All of You' ethos. Clients will notice an evolving look and feel that reflects the RBC global platform and the distinct nuances of the Caribbean.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Announcement and Features Unveiled
articles.summary: Nintendo has unveiled the Nintendo Switch 2, the successor to its groundbreaking hybrid console. The Switch 2 is scheduled for a global release on June 5, 2025. It promises a host of enhancements and new features designed to elevate the gaming experience. The release date is also announced.

articles.title: Samsung A series new launch
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy A26 5G has officially launched in India. It brings a fresh blend of powerful features, premium design and 5G technology.      .   Read more at: Samsung.com/news/launching-a26-5G-in-india.

articles.title: Don't Want to Spring for a New Home Security System? Repurpose Your Old Phone Instead
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: In three easy steps, you can repurpose an old smartphone as a home security camera. Alfred is a free app that gives you a remote view of your live feed, motion detection with alerts, free cloud storage and a two-way audio feed. Alfred Premium offers additional features like higher-resolution viewing and recording, zoom capabilities, ad removal and 30-day cloud storage.

articles.title: Best Amazon deals to shop this weekend: I browsed thousands of sales and found markdowns of up to 75%
articles.summary: The best Amazon deals this weekend include iRobot Roomba i5 Robot Vacuum & Mop for $199 and Yeti Roadie 24 Cooler for $200. Apple iPad Mini (A17 Pro) for $399 is an all-time low.

articles.title: Amazon launches cutting-edge 'Buy for Me' AI-powered shopping assistant
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Amazon has launched an advanced artificial intelligence (AI)-powered tool called Buy for Me. It's a feature that can shop on your behalf even on websites outside of Amazon. The advanced AI shopping assistant is powered by Amazon Nova AI models and Anthropic's Claude. It uses encryption to ensure privacy.

articles.title: RBC Caribbean Unveils New Brand Campaign: ‘Your Ideas Happen Here'
articles.author: IEye News
articles.summary: RBC Caribbean announced today its new brand campaign, 'Your Ideas Happen Here'. The new brand strategy builds on the 'A Bank for All of You' ethos. Clients will notice an evolving look and feel in RBC's campaigns that reflects the RBC global platform while featuring the distinct nuances of the Caribbean.

articles.title: Shopping news: Get the Bissell CrossWave Edge vacuum to tackle the toughest spring cleaning jobs
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Bissell has launched a new state-of-the-art vacuum cleaner. The Bissell CrossWave Edge vacuum is priced at $229.99 and is available for purchase on Bissell's website and major retail stores starting April 2025. It combines unparalleled user-friendly control with cutting-edge technology.

articles.title: Tesla launches cheaper new Model Y in US and Canada
articles.author: Fred Lambert
articles.summary: The new non-Launch Edition version of the new Model Y starts at $49,000 in the US and Canada. The Launch Edition version started at $60,000. Tesla can deliver the vehicle within the US within 1 to 3 weeks and in Canada within 70,000 CAD. Tesla is introducing a new color, Diamond Black, on both Model Y and Model 3.

articles.title: Adsy.pw/hb3 SEO Review - Does it Really Work?
articles.summary: Adsy.pw/hb3 claims to improve search engine optimization (SEO) rankings. This blog post takes an informed, unbiased look at Adsy.w/b3's claims and its potential impact on SEO. It explains why SEO tools play a critical role in marketing strategies.

articles.title: Microsoft is revamping the reviled Windows 11 Start menu - here's a sneak peek
articles.author: Lance Whitney
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing a dramatic overhaul of the Windows 11 Start menu. The changes aim to address some of the many criticisms that have dogged the menu over the years. The new menu displays all your apps right on the main screen, so they are more easily accessible. You can view all the apps in one of three different layouts.

articles.title: Allied Universal's Unified Command Center Solution Honored at Security Industry Association's New Products and Solutions Awards
articles.author: Allied Universal Corp
articles.summary: Allied Universal's Unified Command Center solution was recognized as an honorable mention in the 2025 Security Industry Association (SIA) New Products + Solutions (NPS) Awards. The solution was honored in the Managed Services category at the awards ceremony held at the ISC West conference this week in Las Vegas.

articles.title: How NIESBUD Sparked the Rise of Vijaya Sai Services
articles.author: Naman Bansal
articles.summary: Gummadi Siva Narayana is an entrepreneur from Krishna District, Andhra Pradesh. He learned about the Entrepreneurship Development Program (EDP) organized by NIESBUD and launched Vijaya Sai Services, offering organic jaggery, turmeric, and other homegrown products.

articles.title: HGreg and Polysleep Team Up for an Unforgettable April Fools and Reach 2 Million People
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: HGreg and Polysleep created a fictitious car pillow for April Fool's Day. The product was featured on both companies' websites. HGreg was delighted by the interest that consumers demonstrated and is happy that they were able to spark their curiosity. Polysleep was happy to partner with another renowned Québec company.

articles.title: HGreg and Polysleep Team Up for an Unforgettable April Fools and Reach 2 Million People
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: HGreg and Polysleep created an April Fool's Day joke about an innovative pillow for cars. The campaign was seen by nearly 2 million people and got 75,000 clicks on the respective company pages. This content is reserved for subscribers only and is free to read.

articles.title: NVIDIA's Secret Weapon: RTX 5060 Ti Leak Hints at Game-Changing Price War
articles.author: Khac Phu Nguyen
articles.summary: NVIDIA is preparing a mid-April launch of its new GeForce RTX 5060 Ti GPUs in both 16 GB and 8 GB variants. The 16 GB model will cost $499 and the 8 GB version $399. NVIDIA is moving fast to dominate the mid-range and clear out old-gen stock for the new "Blackwell" lineup.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A26 5G arrives with 50 MP camera and battery for 17 hours of use
articles.author: Redação Portal
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy A26 5G has been launched. It has a 50 MP main camera, a 5,000 mAh battery that lasts up to 17 hours of continuous use, a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display, and IP67 certification for water and dust resistance. It is available in green, black, and white. It comes with One UI 7 interface, based on Android.

articles.title: You won't be able to live without Stanley's latest surprise — 2 new lunch boxes, and they're still in stock
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: Stanley dropped its new Oasis Collection earlier this week. The new Lunch Box color options with the Cream Cornflower Gloss and Peach Whip Gloss are selling for $35 each. Stanley's Classic Legendary Useful Boxes are coveted for their versatility and 1.25-quart capacity.

articles.title: Meghan Markle Says a Dating App Helped Her Pivot Branding For As Ever
articles.summary: Meghan Markle has released her first As Ever products this week. The nine home goods are priced between $14 and $28. Meghan's partnering with Netflix's Consumer Products Group changed her ambitions for the business. She is not looking to Martha Stewart for inspiration.

articles.title: Newmarket firm's food allergy app helping consumers buy Canadian
articles.author: Newmarkettoday Staff
articles.summary: There are one in two Canadian households impacted by food allergies. Newmarket-based firm Flappd Tech Inc. has launched an Allergy Friendly Canada section on its Food Allergy App to help people with food allergies to find Canadian alternatives. The section is designed with a focus on clarity and ease-of-use.

articles.title: Mercedes Goes Full Jaguar
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz has launched a new fashion collection in New York City. It's a partnership with Moncler, a men's luxury clothing brand known for weirdness, and NIGO, a Japanese fashion designer who launched streetwear brand A Bathing Ape. The collection is described as a 'fusion of 80s/90s vibes with contemporary lifestyle aesthetics' Only 20 units of the G-Wagon Past II Future have been made.

articles.title: Do not do startup for the sake of it, says Boat cofounder Aman Gupta
articles.author: ETtech
articles.summary: Aman Gupta, cofounder of wearables brand Boat, advises young entrepreneurs not to do a startup just for the sake of it. He also highlights the rise of founder branding, a strategic tool where entrepreneurs leverage their personal image to boost business visibility and trust. Boat is set to file the draft prospectus for an initial public offering (IPO) at the Startup Mahakumbh.

articles.title: Supabase MCP Server
articles.author: https://github.com/gregnr
articles.summary: Supabase launched an official MCP server to connect AI tools directly with Supabase. MCP stands for Model Context Protocol. It standardizes how Large Language Models talk to platforms like Supabase and allows them to launch databases, manage tables, fetching config, and querying data on your behalf. There are over 20 tools available in the server. You can design tables, track migrations, fetch data and run reports using SQL queries, create database branches for development (experimental) and fetch project configuration.

articles.title: The 'Holy Grail Of Dish Soaps' Is On A Rare 30% Off Sale
articles.author: Erica Kam
articles.summary: Dawn Platinum Plus Powerwash dish soap is on sale for 30% off on Amazon. The spray mechanism allows you to easily cover dishes with suds that activate on contact. The dish soap has 90,000 5-star reviews and counting on Amazon and is very effective.

articles.title: A happy outcome for Takapuna golf?
articles.author: Simon Wilson
articles.summary: Advertise with New ZealandME.com.uk. NZME.uk is a service of New Zealand Media Exchange.    New Media Exchange is a division of Media Exchange International, which offers services to the Media Exchange Marketer. New Media Marketer is based in New Zealand.

articles.title: Lidl trials game-changing app shopping feature across all UK stores
articles.author: Jessica Lindsay
articles.summary: Lidl is trialling a new Click, Reserve & Collect service via the Lidl Plus app for the first time ever. Shoppers will be able to order products up to two weeks in advance. The Parkside Robot Lawnmower will be available to reserve from Monday April 7. It will be delivered to the store on April 24.

articles.summary: Product Spec. Price (NTD/mt) and Price (NTD/MTP) are listed below. NTD/ MTP is the product's price. NGT/MT is the price per unit. NDT/MT are the product prices.

articles.author: Christina Marfice
articles.summary: Amazon's new releases page is curated selection of trending must-haves that have just hit the virtual shelves. This week's highlights include unique new LEGO sets, a Ninja Swirl by CREAMi ice cream and soft serve maker, Terrug Floral Large Area Rug for Living Room and LEGO Botanicals Lucky Bamboo Building Set.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers filling trolleys with ‘lush' 33p ice cream dupe of world-famous drink as temps soar to 22C this weekend
articles.author: Sophie Warburton
articles.summary: Aldi's Italian Cola Bottle Ice Lollies are 33p cheaper than regular ice cream. It comes after Aldi launched a Nando's dupe range on April 3. The range is over £53 cheaper than the restaurant and feeds a family of four.

articles.title: Silly Nice Celebrates Rapid Growth as Cult Following Fuels Demand Across New York
articles.summary: Silly Nice is a family-owned, Black and Veteran-led cannabis brand headquartered in New York. The brand has a growing fanbase and presence in over 100 licensed dispensaries. Silly Nice's flagship products include solventless Bubble Hash, ultra-pure THC Diamond Powder, infused Flower and sleek portable vapes.

articles.title: Fluidwave Announces Marketplace of Virtual Assistants for AI Productivity App
articles.summary: New feature empowers users to delegate tasks to human assistants, unlocking deeper focus and peace of mind. Fluidwave is an AI-powered productivity app designed for creative minds, neurodivergent thinkers, and self-employed professionals. The team is actively seeking investment partners to help scale the assistant marketplace and bring its vision of human-AI collaboration to a wider audience.

articles.title: This Dry Shampoo is the Only One That Revives My Strands Look Fresh
articles.author: Taylor Lane
articles.summary: The Drybar Detox Dry Shampoo is on sale now at Amazon for $23 (originally $28). It's the only formula that doesn't leave buildup or a pesky white finish in dark hair. Over 700 shoppers have purchased the dry shampoo this month.

articles.title: Ulta Beauty just relaunched Undefined Beauty's gel-creme moisturizer, and it includes a bigger boost of hydration
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: Undefined Beauty's new R&R Gel-Creme is available for $24 at Undefined Beauty. The new formula is closer to a true cream than the original gel-leaning texture. The product still contains the usual plant-sourced ingredients. It's available at Ulta for $28.

articles.title: You won't have to leave the Amazon app even when buying from other retailers thanks to the company's new 'Buy for Me' agentic AI bot
articles.author: James Bentley
articles.summary: Amazon's new "Buy for Me" function will let you search for specific items by specific brands and order them from the Amazon app even if Amazon itself doesn't stock them. The new feature uses "agentic AI" which is a buzzword for a more advanced generative AI. The app can receive confirmation of purpose and give you up-to-date delivery tracking.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Aims to Address Predecessor's Issues Instead of Adding New Gimmicks
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: When it comes to console launches, Nintendo has traditionally featured a big gimmick for its hardware. From a software developer's perspective, they thought of what they'd want in a console if they were creating a game, as Nintendo did with the Wii U and DS.

articles.title: 'Top quality' Amazon hair dryer that dries locks in '2 minutes' gets £30 savings discount
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: The TQQ Hair Dryer usually sells for £89 is on sale for £75.64 on Amazon. Prime members can get it for £45.64 with a 15% discount. The dryer has a 110,000 RPM high-speed brushless motor and uses ion technology to close the hair cuticle.

articles.title: Motorola's new cheap phone offers great value for money – plus it feels like a canvas tote bag
articles.author: Jamie Richards
articles.summary: Motorola has announced a new cheap phone with a unique canvas finish and what it calls the 'world's first quad-curve edge display'. The Motorola Edge 60 Fusion comes equipped with a 6.67-inch curved display and starts at £299.99. The phone has a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chipset and 8GB of RAM. It also has a 50MP camera with optical image stabilization and an ultra-wide lens with in-built macro abilities. It comes in Zephyr, Slipstream and Amazonite colors.

articles.title: Dunkin's unveils spring menu; what's new at Dunkin's and Starbucks this spring?
articles.author: Damon C. Williams
articles.summary: Dunkin's and Starbucks are offering spring-related menu items. Dunkin's spring menu includes donuts, energy drinks and Munchkins. Starbucks is offering several spring-themed items through its "Spring Edit" menu. Damon C. Williams is a Philadelphia-based journalist reporting on trending topics.

articles.title: AdCellerant Expands Internationally with Canadian Market Entry, Welcomes Industry Veteran George Leith
articles.author: Ad Cellerant
articles.summary: AdCellerant announces its official expansion into Canada. This marks the company's first step in bringing its award-winning technology and services to new markets. AdCellerant is a leader in marketing technology solutions and brings its services and technology to Canada.

articles.title: What Is the Meta AI Button in WhatsApp, and How Do I Remove It?
articles.author: Diego Barbera
articles.summary: The Meta AI chatbot is rolling out across the entire Meta ecosystem, including Messenger and Instagram. It can provide basic features like answering questions, generating text or creating content. It has also raised privacy concerns with users, and questions as to whether it can be turned off.

articles.title: Capital Rundown for April 3, 2025
articles.summary: Amazon's new releases page curates the hottest products to go on sale in the last seven days. It's also a place to buy new products that Amazon has curated for you to buy on the market place.    for more information, visit Amazon.com/news.

articles.title: People are only just realising what Q-tip actually means after name change
articles.author: Paige Freshwater
articles.summary: Q-tips were invented by Leo Gerstenzang in 1923. The product's name was changed to Q-tips Baby Gays in 1926. The Q-tip stands for quality and the tip describes the cotton swab at the end of the stick. The Hobnobs biscuit was introduced by McVitie's in 1987.

articles.title: McLaren has a new owner, will expand into 'new product categories'
articles.summary: McLaren has a new owner and will expand into new product categories under new owner's control.      Â   for McLaren's new owner is a British company called McLaren Automotive. It's owned by British businessman Ron Jeremy.

articles.title: Azercell's customer satisfaction index for call center achieved 95% in 2024
articles.summary: Azercell's Customer Support Center handled over 4 million inquiries last year. Most inquiries were related to tariffs, internet packages, digital services, co-branded offerings, number transactions, balance details, and current promotions. AiCell, Azerbaijan's first AI-powered virtual assistant, resolved nearly 17% of customer inquiries without human intervention. The company's chatbot handled 750,000 inquiries, including 103,000 direct messages via Facebook and Instagram.

articles.title: How to Convert Your Physical SIM to eSIM on iPhone and Android
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: You can change SIM cards with just a few steps. It's possible to leave physical SIMs behind without changing the phone number. It is possible to change a SIM without changing a phone number, too. It can be done in a matter of minutes.

articles.title: I didn't think the Dyson airwrap was for me, but now there's a version for my curly hair
articles.author: Elena Chabo
articles.summary: Elena Chabo has curly 3B/3C hair and wants to know if the Dyson airwrap is worth its hefty £450 price tag. She tested the large round volumising brush, the diffuser, the wide-tooth comb, the fast dryer and the conical barrel.

articles.author: Matt Vensel
articles.summary: Information about your activity on this service can be stored and combined with other information about you to build a profile about you. The profile can be used later to present content that appears more relevant based on your possible interests, such as adapting the order in which content is shown to you.

articles.title: Brits gobsmacked to discover what the 'Q' in Q-tips actually stands for
articles.author: Paige Freshwater
articles.summary: Brits are shocked to discover what the "Q" in Q-tips stands for. The product was invented by Leo Gerstenzang in 1923. The Q-tip stands for quality and the word "tips" describes the cotton swab at the end of the stick. The origin of the Hobnobs name has surprised fans of the snack.

articles.title: Mozilla unveils Thundermail to compete with Microsoft 365, Gmail
articles.author: Ahmed Boulor
articles.summary: Mozilla has unveiled Thundermail, a new web-based email service. It will work similarly to Gmail and Microsoft 365, but with more robust privacy safeguards and no adverts or data harvesting. Thundermail is part of a 'Thunderbird Pro' ecosystem, which includes tools like Thunderbird Send for file sharing, Appointment for scheduling, and Assist for AI functions with privacy protections.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers say 'superb' window vac is 'better than a Karcher'
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: The Tower Cordless Window Cleaner with Rechargeable Battery has received 885 reviews on Amazon. The gadget has been discounted to £19 in a time limited sale. It is a budget-friendly alternative to the renowned Kảrcher Window Vac range, which starts from £39.

articles.title: New Warning Now Appearing On Millions of Phones in New York
articles.author: Welber
articles.summary: Google has added a new "Yellow Warning" to its Android app store. The app is often uninstalled, has limited active users or Google has limited knowledge about the apps. It's possible the app is a scam looking to install malware on your phone or steal your money or identity.

articles.title: Achy feet and dry heels? An expert shares the best foot care products — starting at $6
articles.author: Madison San Miguel
articles.summary: According to Dr. Karena Wu, the best foot care products for dry and aching feet are Baby Foot's Original Exfoliation Foot Peel and Flexitol Heel Balm for dry feet. The Chirp Wheel XR Foot Roller is an award-winning product for runners.

Coffee lovers can look forward to special offers, exclusive promotions and memorable brand experiences as part of this dynamic collaboration between the two brands.

articles.title: How AI is optimizing product discovery and increasing conversion rates in E-commerce
articles.author: Bi Africa
articles.summary: According to McKinsey, companies that use AI-driven personalization can increase their revenue by 10 to 15%. Amazon's AI tracks your interests and shows products that fit your habits before you even search for them. When someone leaves an online store without checking out, AI spots that behavior and sends them a reminder email.

articles.title: Microsoft enters mini PC market with its slick Windows 365 Link
articles.author: Hellard
articles.summary: Microsoft's Windows 365 Link thin client is available for $349.99 in several countries. Regional availability includes the US, Canada, Australia, Germany, Japan, New Zealand, and the UK. Link is marketed for businesses and is easier for IT departments to manage than a traditional computer.

articles.author: Jeff Turbett

It has earned nearly 5,600 five-star ratings from shoppers who have called it 'life changing.' It comes in black and blue but the latter has already sold out.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 is official – Here's how it stacks up against the Steam Deck
articles.summary: Nintendo's Switch 2 has been revealed in full. It's the successor to the Nintendo Switch, which was launched in 2017. The Steam Deck uses an AMD APU and comes equipped with 16 GB of LPDDR5 RAM. The Switch 2 features a 7.9-inch LCD panel with full HD resolution, a high refresh rate of 120Hz, VRR (Variable Refresh Rate) support, and HDR capability. Steam Deck OLED has a 1280x800 panel and supports a 90Hz refresh rate, whereas the LCD version shares the same resolution but is limited to 60Hz. The Nintendo Switch 2 starts at $449.99 USD, while the Steam Deck is more expensive for the

articles.title: There's Zero Shame In Weird Body Things, But These 47 Products Can Help
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: There are many products to help with stubborn warts, smelly breath, and ingrown hairs. O'Keeffe's Working Hands hand cream helps transform and soothe dry, cracked skin with a protective moisture layer that delivers hydrating relief. Medicated bandages will protect your warts while helping to exfoliate your skin from bibbity-boppity.

articles.title: People are just learning what Q in Q-tip actually stands for after name change
articles.author: Paige Freshwater
articles.summary: Leo Gerstenzang created Q-tips in 1923 after watching his wife apply wads of cotton to a toothpick. The Q-tip stands for quality and the word "tips" describes the cotton swab at the end of the stick. Hobnobs was introduced by McVitie's in 1987 and became a bestseller.

articles.title: Have We Reached a Distroless Tipping Point
articles.author: Hackers News
articles.summary: There's a virtuous cycle in technology that pushes the boundaries of what's being built and how it's being used. People start experimenting and discover novel applications, use cases, and approaches to maximize the innovation's potential. These use cases generate significant value, fueling demand for the next iteration of technology.

articles.title: Swastika Infra files IPO papers with SEBI; aims to raise ₹200 cr via fresh issue
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: The company's IPO is a combination of a fresh issue of and an issue of shares. It is expected to go public in a few weeks' time.  It will be offered on a mix of shares and shares of stock market value.  For confidential support call the Samaritans on 08457 90 90 90 or visit a local Samaritans branch.

articles.title: Reinventing pork for the future
articles.author: Tom Kiwaradio.Com
articles.summary: Taste What Pork Can Do is the new tagline for IARN. The new campaign will launch digitally in May. The focus of the new campaign is to reach consumers by concentrating on generational differences. National Pork Board member Gordon Spronk says pork promotion started in 1985.

articles.title: Prices you can't miss: Get over 50% off on best washing machines at Amazon Summer Fest
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: Amazon Summer Fest offers significant discounts on the top 10 washing machines. The focus is on functionality and value, enabling you to manage household chores effectively. Samsung, LG, and Acer's washing machines are discounted by over 40%. Semi-automatic washing machines with built-in dryers are going for over 50%.

articles.title: We asked camera companies why their RAW formats are all different and confusing
articles.author: Antonio G. Di Benedetto
articles.summary: There is no standardized RAW file format for cameras. Most cameras capture RAW files in proprietary formats, like Canon's CR3, Nikon's NEF, and Sony's ARW. DNG was created in 2004 by Thomas Knoll, one of the co-creators of Photoshop. Some smaller camera manufacturers have been using the DNG format for years, while others like Sigma have adopted it recently.

articles.title: ESScent Of The Week: How Francis Kurkdjian Bottled Childhood Joy With 'Kurky'
articles.author: Kimberly Wilson
articles.summary: Francis Kurkdjian has created a new fragrance called KURKY. It was inspired by a scent he created as gifts for friends' newborns and his childhood memory of sugared almonds from his baptism. It's fruity and playful, but it's not very long-lasting.

articles.title: 2024 Deer Seasons Summarized
articles.author: dakotaedgeoutdoors
articles.summary: NDG&F releases a press release on its Facebook page.    ndgandf.com/news/releases/ndg&f-press-release-for-the-publication-of-ngdf-news.

articles.title: P&G's Tide Services inks 50-unit franchise deal with CMG Cos.
articles.summary: Tide Services signed a 50-unit franchise deal with CMG Cos. to expand Tide Laundromats in the Southwest U.S. P&G opened its first laundromat in Chicago in 2021. The initial franchise fee is $10,000 per unit, and new owners can expect to invest between $681,100 and $1.5 million.

articles.title: What's on the menu at LMCU Ballpark
articles.summary: There are some new items to try at LMCU Ballpark on April 4, 2025, and there are new things to try. There are also some new things on the menu at Ballpark that are available to try now.   .

articles.title: Dang! Everyday Gentle Foaming Face Wash Review
articles.summary: Dang! Skincare sent Pulse Picks their Everyday Gentle Foaming Face Wash for a review. Pulse Picks loves the packaging. The product is available in a 120ml bottle for ₦11,200. It's hydrating, calming and has gentle ingredients for sensitive skin.

articles.title: Wyze's new AI feature only tells you the important things caught on your security cameras – here's how
articles.author: Bethan Girdler-Maslen
articles.summary: Wyze has added a new AI-powered NBD feature to its Cam Unlimited Pro subscription. NBD uses an AI filter to review the events captured by your security cameras and rank them in order of importance to determine whether you need to be notified about them or not.

articles.title: Sightly Strengthens AI Capabilities with BrandGuard Acquisition
articles.summary: Sightly has acquired the assets of Nova AI, Inc., including its BrandGuard AI-powered brand governance technology. Sightly has hired key members from BrandGuard's Data Science and Engineering teams. Rob May, CEO and founder of BrandGuard, has joined Sightly as special advisor for corporate development and AI strategy. Deirdre McGlashan, who previously served as chief marketing officer at BrandGuard has also taken on an advisory role at Sightly.

articles.title: Microsoft turns 50: A look back at everything from the Altair to the Zune
articles.author: National Public Radio
articles.summary: The company helped launch the software industry and brought a computer to every desktop. Hit products like Windows and the Xbox became household names, but does anyone remember the Zune? It's a long way from then to now, but it was a big success.

articles.title: The truth about tech startup failures in Nigeria
articles.author: Technext

articles.title: Lidl's ‘must-have' gardening gadget which can transform your lawn for spring is selling £150 cheaper than B&Q version
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: Lidl's Parkside Robot Lawnmower is the perfect tool for getting your lawn in tip top condition for spring. It's suitable for garden up to 500m 2 and has three adjustable area modes and up to five defines secondary modes for spot mowing. The product can mow your lawn for up to 45 minutes and takes 60 minutes to charge. It costs £199 when reserved via the Lidl Plus app, which is £150 cheaper than a comparable product at B&Q.

articles.title: Lidl's ‘must-have' gardening gadget which can transform your lawn for spring is selling £150 cheaper than B&Q version

articles.title: Here's how to spend less on your monthly phone bills

This will be the first phone to have a technology like this and is expected to launch later this month. Huawei announces its new partnership with Mamelodi Sundowns Football Club.

articles.title: Does Amazon have Nintendo Switch 2 pre-orders? Full rules
articles.author: Technology Writer
articles.summary: Amazon is handling Nintendo Switch 2 pre-orders a bit differently. Amazon is doing the orders by invite only. Argos and Smyths have both had pre-order open in the 24 hours since the console was revealed. The prices range from £395.99 to £429.99 for the package deal. Nintendo will start its own pre-ordering on April 8 in the UK.

articles.title: Does Amazon have Nintendo Switch 2 pre-orders? Full rules
articles.author: Technology Writer
articles.summary: Amazon is handling Nintendo Switch 2 pre-orders a bit differently. Amazon is doing the orders by invite only. Argos and Smyths have already sold out. Nintendo will be starting its own pre-order on April 8 in the UK. The console will be released on June 5th.

articles.title: 25 Target Products That'll Make You Excited For People To See Your Home

articles.title: Why traditional sales tactics fail in Nigeria's SaaS industry—solutions
articles.author: Wilson Dike
articles.summary: Nigeria's Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) industry is maturing rapidly, but many companies still rely on outdated sales tactics to boost adoption. Traditional sales scripts focus heavily on features instead of outcomes. Modern SaaS sales start with education and focus on digital content and thought leadership.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Unveiled: Know All About Features, Price And Sale Date
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Nintendo officially unveiled the highly anticipated Nintendo Switch 2 console on Wednesday. articles.title: 27 Comfortable Pieces Of Clothing From Old Navy To Lounge In All Week
articles.author: Ellie Jane Rudy
articles.summary: It's time you reached your highest form: a couch potato. Old Navy has a selection of comfortable clothes for the couch potato in every size and price range. Some of the products may have been sent as samples, but all were independently selected by our editors.

articles.title: Midjourney begins rolling out V7, its first new AI image model in nearly a year with a "totally different architecture", a week after OpenAI's new image tool (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: Midjourney is rolling out V7, its first new AI image model in nearly a year with a totally different architecture. OpenAI's new image tool was released a week ago. Midjourney was one of the earliest AI image-generating services on the web.

articles.title: Going off the shallow end with the Yangwang U8 from BYD's luxury brand
articles.author: Shreejit Changaroth
articles.summary: BYD was the best-selling EV brand in Singapore in 2024 and continues to grow. It was founded in 1995 and manufactures rechargeable batteries for radio-control models, communication devices and electric vehicles. It also has a luxury brand, Yangwang, which offers SUVs and saloons.

articles.title: Biggest Online Shopping Platform in Bulgaria Adopts Dual Pricing in Euros and Levs
articles.author: Web
articles.summary: eMAG Bulgaria has introduced dual currency price display on its platform, allowing customers to see prices in both euros and Bulgarian levs. The change applies across all product pages, shopping carts and final order summaries. Prices are automatically converted based on the official exchange rate. The feature will soon be available on the retailer's mobile application.

articles.title: Tim Hortons brews more brand presence in Seoul with line of retail coffee products available now in grocery
articles.summary: The first Tim Hortons restaurant in South Korea opened in the Seoul Metropolitan Area in 2023 and the brand has rapidly expanded to 16 restaurants. The new coffee products are available in Original Blend, French Vanilla, Colombian, Maple and Decaf. They are available now at the Lotte Mart grocery store in Gangdong Millennial Jungheung S-Class Complex near Cheonho Branch in Seoul.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 design revealed in leaked renders, looks a lot like Edge 60 Fusion
articles.summary: Motorola is expanding its Edge 60 series with the Edge 60 Fusion. Leaked renders show the phone in two Pantone-certified colours: Pleasant Blue and Green. The device features a premium build with a 3D silicone vegan leather back, triple-camera setup and an LED flash. It is rumoured to be powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 processor. The phone is expected to run Android 15.

articles.title: Midjourney releases its first new AI image model in nearly a year
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Midjourney has released its first new AI image model in nearly a year. The V7 model began rolling out in alpha around midnight Eastern on Friday. It comes a week after OpenAI debuted a new image generator in ChatGPT that quickly went viral for its use.

Windows 365 Link connects directly to the company's Windows 365 cloud service and is more easily manageable by IT departments than a typical computer.

articles.title: Amazon Is Testing a New 'Buy for Me' Feature That Uses AI to Simplify Third-Party Purchases

articles.title: Amazon's new AI agent will shop third-party sites for you

articles.summary: Amazon is starting to test a new AI shopping agent, a feature it calls Buy for Me, with a subset of users. If Amazon doesn't sell something that users are searching for, the feature will display products to users that other websites are selling. Click here to read the full news.

articles.title: Samsung delays Galaxy S25 Edge launch again: Know what's behind the sudden change?
articles.summary: The launch of the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge has been pushed back to May 13, 2025. It is a month later than the expected release date of April 15th. The delay is not linked to production or hardware issues, but to internal changes at Samsung. Samsung will launch the device in an online-only event.

articles.title: BLOX NXT Unveiled: The future of content management is here

articles.title: Amazon's new AI agent will shop third-party sites for you
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.summary: Amazon is starting to test a new AI shopping agent called "Buy for Me" with a subset of users. Buy for Me is powered by Amazon's Amazon Nova AI models and Anthropic's Claude AI model. It uses encryption to securely insert your billing information on third-party sites, so Amazon can't see what you're ordering.

articles.title: Trump ends tax exemption for low-value Chinese imports

articles.summary: The days of getting trendy clothing, tools and gag gifts that cost less than lunch delivered to your door are gone, according to a notice to customers dazzled by the low-priced products on Chinese shopping apps sent by the U.S. government.

articles.title: GitHub - holepunchto/bare: Small and modular JavaScript runtime for desktop and mobile
articles.summary: Bare is a small and modular JavaScript runtime for desktop and mobile. It provides an asynchronous, event-driven architecture for writing applications. It's ideal for networked, peer-to-peer applications that can run on a wide selection of hardware. It makes embedding and cross-device support core use cases.
